description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title
VALVE, GATE

### Reference Number
PW-23-01021889

### Tender Closing Date
2023-02-27T14:00:00
Expired - please note that the deadline has passed.

### Procurement Information
The Department of National Defence is seeking the procurement of Gate Valves for delivery to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. The required specifications are as follows:

- **Item 1**
  - GSIN: 4820
  - NSN: 21-908-2808
  - Quantity: 12
  - Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
  - To be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
- **Item 2**
  - GSIN: 4820
  - NSN: 21-908-2808
  - Quantity: 12
  - Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
  - To be delivered to CFB Halifax

Bidders may submit Equivalent or Substitute Products, providing the brand name and model or part number, and NCAGE.

### Tender Requirements
- All prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information
- Jean-Pierre Normandin, Procurement Directorate
- Phone: 819-939-3674
- Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
- BC (British Columbia)
- NS (Nova Scotia)

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr
Ottawa, Ontario
K1A 0K2, Canada

### Related Documents
The tender document is available at the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/18/3e4d20f33ae97c0ea4971b16e0e971f0/rfp_w8482-231164-a-en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/18/d02979561e7ae20cf503108d3a6e64c6/rfp_w8482-231164-a-fr.pdf (French)  …
